quotes.quote: On oil spills: "From time to time there are going to be things that occur that are acts of God that cannot be prevented."
On access to contraception: " Bring me one woman who has been left behind. Bring me one. There’s not one."
On the KKK: "was okay until I found out they smoked pot."
"I would imagine that there is probably a gun in the schools to protect from potential grizzlies."
"I like beautiful women eating burgers in bikinis. I think it’s very American."
